title: What was the first BTS song you heard that made you like them? - Quora

response.answer_text: I saw a live performance of DNA and let’s say I was stunned. The song was great but what shook me was the stage. That was the most spectacular performance I had ever seen on a live stage. They were dancing and singing at the same time and I noticed that they weren’t even lip syncing!!!! I was instantly drawn to them and started trying to know more about them. Even if their songs didn’t suit my style of music initially, I ended up loving and adoring the songs sooo much that I am a crazy BTS fan now… xD

It’s hard to say, really. I discovered them through MIC Drop one time in general ethics class (yes, that’s a thing). We were watching the BBMAs, I think. I got curious, and eventually, I ended up watching Blood, Sweat and Tears. It was a total coincidence, but it really clicked with me. Next came their other mainstreams videos: Fake Love, Not Today, Dope, etc. Even though I already liked BTS’s music at the very beginning— with MIC Drop— I think the final blow, le coup de foudre was Baepsae. That’s when I wanted to know all about them.
